ygData.subject: Re: Song Lock Whip?
ygData.msgSnippet: This hapened to me in the misty thicket last night,... but i wasnt using a whip, just a scimitar .... i have no idea what caused it TalonStar, Wandering
ygData.messageBody:
This hapened to me in the misty thicket last night,... but i wasnt using a
whip, just a scimitar .... i have no idea what caused it
TalonStar, Wandering minstrel, E'ci
-----Original Message-----
From: Paco1@... <Paco1@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 2:00 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Song Lock Whip?


>From: Paco1@...
>
>I use a tentical whip every once in a while. When it does the lifetap the
song I am playing seems to lock. When this happens all the spell buttons
turn back to normal and I cant start a song new because the other one is
still going, nor can I stop it without haveing to log or zone.
>
>Has this happened to anyone else?
>
>Tanas, Bard of the World, Tarrew Marr
